attributes.action: For the Queen to reinstate the Reverend Gavin Ashenden as her chaplain.
attributes.additional_details:
The original story is here:
https://www.express.co.uk/news/world/753180/koran-passage-sung-st-mary-episcopal-cathedral-glasgow-arabic-scottish-church-service-god

The resignation explained, including reference to the role Buckingham Palace played:
https://ashenden.org/2017/01/21/resignation-form-the-office-of-chaplain-to-the-queen/
attributes.background: Chaplain to Her Majesty, Reverend Gavin Ashenden, resigned under pressure from the royal household having spoken out against the reciting of Koranic texts in a service at St Mary’s Cathedral in Glasgow which offend Christianity - denying the divinity of Christ. The Queen swore to defend the faith.
